text: Stewart Cook / variety / REX / Shutterstock If anyone did the comic - con right this year, it's Mark Hamill. The actor went completely incognito to the annual convention and appeared every day in a different costume that paid tribute to the Star Wars franchise. Hamill was completely unrecognizable when he walked through the San Diego Convention Center just to reveal his various social media disguises over the weekend. In front of the star - studded gathering, Hamill teased a potential appearance by sharing a photo of himself asking a question from USA Today this question in a headline ` ` Where's Luke?''
